val: Philips HMSP is a project aimed at providing a digital solution to their elderly customers to manage safe and easy independent ageing, and give their family easy access to real-time and meaningful insights and collaboration tools to act proactively about the health and safety status of their ageing loved one. Responsibilities included: - Building microservices architecture for the project using Lagom framework. - Research and development on DGraph and integrating the project with the same as a graph database.
